      • isCell

        protected boolean isCell(int checkRow,
                         int checkColumn)
        Determine if the cell coordinates match the ones supplied
        Parameters:
        checkRow - row index in view coordinates to compare to this cell's row index
        checkColumn - column index in view coordinates to compare to this cell's column index
        Returns:
        true if the cell's row and column indices match the specified ones
